availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Mortimer D. Hay (Muhlenburg County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Muhlenburg County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Elisabeth Hay. Attorney in Muhlenberg County in 1860. Attorney in Muhlenberg County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Muhlenburg County, District 2, p. 43.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Muhlenburg County, KY, July 1863, p. 14.
